note:
Endowed by nature with a magnificent beard and a fine voice, it was almost inevitable that Piers would grow up to be a folk singer, and so they have!

An old internet bloke of longstanding, they've served time as a sysadmin, ISP operator and programmer before RSI buggered up all those career paths.

These days he's most likely to be found at home working as his wife's carer, or streaming #FolkSongs on Friday nights at https://youtube.com/pierscawley/live

fields.name: Website
fields.value: https://bofh.org.uk

fields.name: Motto
fields.value: If a thing's worth doing, it's worth doing badly

fields.name: Advice
fields.value: I beseech thee, in the bowels of Christ, think it possible ye may be wrong
